description: An investigation is launched after a seven-month-old boy is left outside in temperatures of -7C.
title: Russian baby left on balcony freezes to death
title_page: Russian baby left on balcony freezes to death - BBC News
maintext: "Do not pass by if another child is in danger - in winter a child who is lost or injured on the street can very quickly become a victim of low temperatures," it added.
